news.title: Panels will be formed to prevent illegal constructions: Tamil Nadu to HC
news.para: The state submitted that pursuant to an earlier order suggesting formation of committees to monitor and prevent unauthorised constructions in corporations and municipalities, a meeting was organised by the government.

news.title: BAI urges Tamil Nadu government to curb steep increase in prices of construction materials
news.para: The association said the prices of M-sand, P-sand and jelly had increased by almost 30% since February 1. “This sudden price escalation has badly affected the builders, contractors and building owners, leading to financial losses and reduction/suspension of construction activities"

news.title: Cabinet approves B khatas for illegal properties in Karnataka
news.para: To implement these measures effectively, the govt plans to introduce bills amending the Karnataka Municipal Corporations Act, 1976, and the Karnataka Municipalities Act, 1964, during the ongoing budget session of the assembly.

news.title: Kerala court rejects graft complaint against CM over sand mining from Alappuzha coast
news.para: A Kerala court has rejected a complaint alleging corruption by Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan and various officials back in 2019 in connection with a government order permitting removal of sand from the Thottappally coastal area in Alappuzha district.

news.title: British builder MJ Gleeson points to housing recovery signs amid drop in mortgage rates
news.para: Gleeson CEO Graham Prothero said the group's land business continued to see strong interest from a range of both large and regional developers.

news.title: CBRE forecasts 2024 profit largely above estimates
news.para: The Dallas-based company expects full-year earnings per share to be in the range of $4.25 to $4.65, the mid-point of which was above analysts' estimates of $4.34, according to LSEG data.

news.title: Uttarakhand pollution control board seals nine hotels in Mussoorie
news.para: R K Chaturvedi, regional officer, UPCB, said that in a survey of 282 hotels done last year, these nine hotels were operating without valid Consolidated Consent and Authorisation (CCA) from UPCB, for which they were issued notices.

news.title: Builders can opt for Uttar Pradesh government's rehabilitation package till Feb 22
news.para: The notice was issued on Monday. “If developers do not reply or agree to the government’s package, it will be assumed that they do not want to become part of the rehabilitation package,” said authority CEO Lokesh M.

news.title: Table Space Technologies leases over one lakh sq ft in Cafe Coffee Day Square Property in Bengaluru
news.para: Table Space Technologies has leased over one lakh square feet in the Cafe Coffee Day Square Property in Bengaluru as its erstwhile corporate headquarter and flagship store. The lease term is 60 months with a lock-in period and commands a rental of Rs 175 per square foot.

news.title: Haryana RERA asks banks to monitor withdrawal of funds from RERA accounts
news.para: The authority has also directed banks to strictly monitor withdrawals to avoid legal action and inform developers that they may face a penalty up to 5% of the project cost in case of violations.

news.title: Delhi HC orders probe into diversion of funds by Three C Shelters
news.para: The bench of Justice Dharmesh Sharma further directed the registrar of companies (ROC) and the Union ministry of corporate affairs (MCA) to jointly initiate action and ensure step-wise compliance of the Companies Act, 2013 by the developer.

news.title: Industrialists miffed as KIADB hikes land prices in Gamanagatti area
news.para: KIADB has issued a notice to us to evaluating the cost of our ploit at Rs 98 lakh as against the assured price of Rs 63 lakh in 2018.

news.title: At Rs 6.84 lakh crore, HDFC Bank's home loan book closes gap with SBI's
news.para: SBI overtook HDFC in home loan assets in February 2021 when its book crossed the Rs 5 lakh crore-mark with a market share of 23.5 per cent as against HDFC's 17 per cent.

news.title: Odisha housing department launches portal to allot homes to EWS
news.para: A standard operation procedure (SOP) has been issued in this regard wherein the urban development department has mentioned the eligibility, step-by-step process or registration, fee payments, role of project developers and project development authorities.

news.title: Chennai: Udhayam theatre to turn into housing complex
news.para: Udhayam theatre, one of Chennai's first multiplexes, will be demolished by TNHB to make way for a residential complex in Ashok Nagar. Sanjay Chugh from Anarock Group mentioned the high FSI will allow multi-storey buildings to replace the complex. Rajinikanth fans expressed sadness over the closure.

news.title: NBCC to redevelop housing project for MEA at Rs 262 crore in Delhi
news.para: Y K Sailas Thangal, Joint Secretary in MEA; Nidhi Anand, Senior Architect, MEA and K P Mahadevaswamy, CMD, NBCC, among others attended the event.

news.title: Ghaziabad development body told to ensure metro extension doesn't overlap with rapid rail
news.para: The direction was made at a meeting chaired by additional chief secretary for housing and urban planning Nitin Ramesh Gokarn, officials said on Wednesday.

news.title: Sweden's SBB says Lennart Sten proposed as chairman
news.para: Sten a real estate sector veteran with former positions including CEO of Fabege, this month took on a role as senior adviser to SBB's board.

news.title: MahaRERA ties up with ASCI to identify non-complying real estate developers
news.para: The collaboration, a first by any real estate regulator in the country, is aimed at protecting homebuyers who may decide to buy or invest in properties that are yet to be or not allowed to be sold for any specific reason.

news.title: Delhi HC refuses to extend parole of builder sentenced to 182 years in jail
news.para: ​The high court said the sentence imposed cannot be escaped and parole endlessly continued merely on the ground that efforts are being made by the man to arrange for funds for settling the cases with plot buyers as this would be contrary to the scheme for grant of furlough and parole provided under Delhi Prison Rules, 2018.
